definition: The word "geduldig" refers to the quality of being able to wait calmly and endure delays or difficulties without becoming frustrated or annoyed. It is often used to describe a person's temperament or attitude towards waiting or dealing with challenging situations.

examples.german: Sei geduldig und warte auf mich.
examples.english: Be patient and wait for me.

examples.german: Sei geduldig und du wirst Erfolg haben.
examples.english: Be patient and you will succeed.
